revisions.rev:
{{Infobox artist discography |Artist = [[Selena]] |Image = |Caption = |Studio = 5 |Live = 2 |Compilation = 19 |Remix = 1 |Box set = 4 |Soundtrack = 1 |Singles = 41 |Video = 3 |Tribute = 1 |Music videos = 16 |Tours = 4 |References = Yes }} The discography of [[Mexican-American]] singer [[Selena]] consists of her entire singing career, starting from seven independent studio albums on Freddie Records, six [[studio album]]s and [[compilation album]]s released after her [[Murder of Selena|death]].
